title: Canyon Grizl among first to go XPLRing, gets new RockShox 30mm gravel suspension
content:
The fat-tired Canyon Grizl looks to be one of the first gravel bikes to get transformed for bigger off-road adventure & bikepacking exploration with SRAM’s complete XPLR gravel group. Decked out in the complete new 1×12 wireless Force XPLR eTap AXS groupset, and the option to stick with the standard carbon fork or the new […]

The post Canyon Grizl among first to go XPLRing, gets new RockShox 30mm gravel suspension appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
